items.text: full on off stump, and this has been flicked off his toes to deep square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Shoaib Malik, 1 run

items.text: full on middle stump, and defended off the front foot. Firmly struck
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: good length just outside off, and he dabs this fine to third man for a single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off stump, and this is defended with soft hands towards over
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Shoaib Malik, no run

items.text: good length on off stump, and he blocks this off the front foot once again
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Shoaib Malik, no run

items.text: good length outside off, but angling into the batsman. Blocked off the front foot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Shoaib Malik, no run

items.preText: Mehidy's back again. Change of end for him.
items.text: full on middle stump, and spinning away after landing. Blocked off the front foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: full outside off stump, and this is loopier from Mehidy. The front-foot defense comes off the bat's inside half
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: extra flight on off stump, and Imam drives this firmly to mid off. But can't get the single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: full just outside off, and the ball grips the surface slightly. Imam's through his punch too early, and he splices the shot to mid on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.text: full outside off stump, and defended with the turn off the front foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Shoaib Malik, no run

items.text: stays low! Full ball just outside off, but hurries onto the batsman. Manages to get his bat down in time, and taps this towards the leg side
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Shoaib Malik, no run

items.preText: Thanks, Sreshth. Mashrafe to continue, round the wicket to Imam.
items.text: sees Imam shaping to make room and follows him with a fairly full one on leg stump. Defended into the off side
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: length ball angling into middle stump, clipped to midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: comes down the track and this time he gets some width outside off. Slashes hard, over the infield, but only as far as the fielder at deep point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.text: back of a length on off stump, defended into the point region
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Shoaib Malik, no run

items.text: length ball outside off, nice stride forward to defend to extra-cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Shoaib Malik, no run

items.text: back of a length, angling into a fourth-stump line. Defended to mid-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Shoaib Malik, no run

items.text: nice length outside off, goes on the back foot and punches it back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: fuller now, presses forward to push into the covers
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: nice flight, a bit closer to off stump, driven down the ground to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.text: a bit of dip now, on off stump. Looks to come forward to try and clip into the on side, but ends up playing it back to the bowler as the ball drops shorter than expected and doesn't turn as much as expected
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Shoaib Malik, no run

items.text: fuller, clipped to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Shoaib Malik, 1 run

items.text: quicker length ball on off stump, stays in the crease and defends into the cover point region
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.preText: GG: "Now that Shakib is not playing, where will Ban get those 10 overs from!" -- Mahmudullah, Soumya Sarkar and Mominul Haque can all bowl a bit, so they'll be hoping at least one of them has a good game.
items.text: back of a length close to off stump, chopped to backward point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Shoaib Malik, no run
